job.title: Software Engineer - Universal Media
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtthe apple media products engineering team is one of the most exciting examples of apples longheld passion for combining art and technology these are the people who power the app store apple tv apple music apple podcasts and apple books and they do it on a substantial scale meeting apples high expectations with high performance to deliver a huge variety of entertainment in over languages to more than countries these engineers build secure endtoend solutions they develop the custom software used to process all the creative work the tools that providers use to deliver that media all the serverside systems and the apis for many apple services thanks to apples outstanding integration of hardware software and services engineers here partner to get behind a single unified vision that vision always includes a deep dedication to strengthening apples privacy policy one of apples core values although services are a bigger part of apples business than ever before these teams remain small flexible and crossfunctional offering greater exposure to the array of opportunities here the we are looking for an outstanding software engineer to join the apple universal media team and help us build the next generation products that change the way millions of users consume video as a software engineer at apple you will be owning key modules of the product and be responsible for delivering industry grade quality solutionsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt years experience in a professional programming positionltbrgtltbrgtproficient in java javascript html cssltbrgtltbrgtexperience creating applications using javascript web frameworks eg angular react npm webpack gruntltbrgtltbrgtexperience developing restful apis and java server applicationsltbrgtltbrgtexperience with relational and nonrelational data stores eg oracle cassandra redisltbrgtltbrgtexperience with container orchestration eg kubernetesltbrgtltbrgtexperience with search platforms eg solrltbrgtltbrgtexperience with nix and osxltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with version control systems such as gitltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtwe are looking for an outstanding software engineer to join the apple universal media team and help us build the next generation products that change the way millions of users consume video as a full stack software engineer at apple you will be owning key modules of the product and be responsible for delivering industry grade quality solutionsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbachelors degree in computer science and engineering or related fieldltbrgtltbrgt years of industry
